org.dyn4j.collision.narrowphase

Interface MinkowskiPenetrationSolver

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Epa

    public interface MinkowskiPenetrationSolver
    Interface representing a sub algorithm for finding the penetration vector and depth using properties of the MinkowskiSum and Gjk termination information.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Version:
    1.0.3
    Author:
    William Bittle

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void getPenetration(java.util.List<Vector2> simplex, MinkowskiSum minkowskiSum, Penetration penetration)
      Returns the penetration vector and depth in the given Penetration object given the created simplex and MinkowskiSum.

    • Method Detail

      • getPenetration

        void getPenetration(java.util.List<Vector2> simplex,
                  MinkowskiSum minkowskiSum,
                  Penetration penetration)
        Returns the penetration vector and depth in the given Penetration object given the created simplex and MinkowskiSum.
        Parameters:
        simplex - the simplex containing the origin
        minkowskiSum - the MinkowskiSum
        penetration - the Penetration object to fill
